thread.title: The fool proof way to get your teenager to put down their mobile phone
thread.title_full: The fool proof way to get your teenager to put down their mobile phone - Mirror Online

author: Kara O'Neill
title: The fool proof way to get your teenager to put down their mobile phone
text:
Everyone knows teenagers are addicted to their smartphones.
But if you're looking for a way to get them to put down their devices (without having the phone surgically removed from their fingertips), then this video might just have the answer.
And all you need is a particularly wriggly lizard.
LiveLeak Surprise: This lizard is a sure fire way to get your teenager to put down their phone
In the video, a teenager girl sits in a chair talking on her mobile phone which is plugged into to its charging socket in the wall.
But seconds later, her chat is interrupted when a lizard suddenly lands on her lap and crawl across her legs.
LiveLeak Screams: She's really not happy
Predictably, the girl jumps up and screams in horror, throwing her phone to the floor and running around the room in hysterics.
It is thought that the hilarious video was recorded in Brazil and has clocked up more than 156,000 views after being shared on LiveLeak.com.
DailyMirror
